attributes.action:
enable the people to call  vote of no confidence and 
demand  general  election
attributes.additional_details: the present government , and consecutive  conservative governments have run this country into the ground , something needs to be done to stop this , they surely are supposed to be there to represent the people , but this is not the case , the divide between rich and poor is enormous , NHS services at n all time low , Dental care non existent in a lot of the country (Cornwall for example )food prices so high that people cant afford to eat , fuel costs unaffordable , the people who they are meant to represent are going cold and hungry the divide between rich and poor is a disgrace , people are getting angry , something has to change
attributes.background: a change of law to enable the people to call a vote of no confidence ,   and call a general election ,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Change the law so that UK citizens can call a General election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618068
